verses.verse: וַיֵּאָסְפ֤וּ <WH622> gathered themselves together כָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And all the people כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> as one אֶל־ <WH413> at הָ֣רְח֔וֹב <WH7339> into the street אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> that [was] before שַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> gate הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> the water וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and they spake לְעֶזְרָ֣א <WH5830> unto Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <WH5608> the scribe לְהָבִ֗יא <WH935> to bring אֶת־ <WH853> סֵ֙פֶר֙ <WH5612> the book תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> of the law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> for יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> to Israel

וַיָּבִ֣יא <WH935> brought עֶזְרָ֣א <WH5830> And Ezra הַ֠כֹּהֵן <WH3548> the priest אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַתּוֹרָ֞ה <WH8451> the law לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before הַקָּהָל֙ <WH6951> the congregation מֵאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> both of men וְעַד־ <WH5704> against אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> and women וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all מֵבִ֣ין <WH995> with understanding לִשְׁמֹ֑עַ <WH8085> and all that could hear בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> upon the first לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7637> of the seventh

וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> And he read בוֹ֩ לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> therein before הָרְח֜וֹב <WH7339> the street אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> which לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> that [was] before שַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> gate הַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> the water מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאוֹר֙ <WH216> from the morning עַד־ <WH5704> until מַחֲצִ֣ית <WH4276> half הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> in נֶ֛גֶד <WH5048> the presence הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> of men וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> and the women וְהַמְּבִינִ֑ים <WH995> and those that could understand וְאָזְנֵ֥י <WH241> and the ears כָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of all the people אֶל־ <WH413> to סֵ֥פֶר <WH5612> [were attentive] unto the book הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> of the law

וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֞ד <WH5975> stood עֶזְרָ֣א <WH5830> And Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֗ר <WH5608> the scribe עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon מִגְדַּל־ <WH4026> upon a pulpit עֵץ֮ <WH6086> of wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> which they had made לַדָּבָר֒ <WH1697> for the purpose וַיַּֽעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> him stood אֶצְל֡וֹ <WH681> and beside מַתִּתְיָ֡ה <WH4993> Mattithiah וְשֶׁ֡מַע <WH8087> and Shema וַ֠עֲנָיָה <WH6043> and Anaiah וְאוּרִיָּ֧ה <WH223> and Urijah וְחִלְקִיָּ֛ה <WH2518> and Hilkiah וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֖ה <WH4641> and Maaseiah עַל־ <WH5921> on יְמִינ֑וֹ <WH3225> on his right hand וּמִשְּׂמֹאל֗וֹ <WH8040> and on his left hand פְּ֠דָיָה <WH6305> Pedaiah וּמִֽישָׁאֵ֧ל <WH4332> and Mishael וּמַלְכִּיָּ֛ה <WH4441> and Malchiah וְחָשֻׁ֥ם <WH2828> and Hashum וְחַשְׁבַּדָּ֖נָה <WH2806> and Hashbadana זְכַרְיָ֥ה <WH2148> Zechariah מְשֻׁלָּֽם׃ <WH4918> [and] Meshullam פ

וַיִּפְתַּ֨ח <WH6605> opened עֶזְרָ֤א <WH5830> And Ezra הַסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <WH5612> the book לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight כָל־ <WH3605> of all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of all the people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> it all the people הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> become וּכְפִתְח֖וֹ <WH6605> opened עָֽמְד֥וּ <WH5975> stood up כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people

וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed עֶזְרָ֔א <WH5830> And Ezra אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God הַגָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> the great וַיַּֽעֲנ֨וּ <WH6030> answered כָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵ֤ן ׀ <WH543> Amen אָמֵן֙ <WH543> Amen בְּמֹ֣עַל <WH4607> with lifting up יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3027> their hands וַיִּקְּד֧וּ <WH6915> and they bowed וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲוֻּ֛ <WH7812> their heads and worshipped לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אַפַּ֥יִם <WH639> with [their] faces אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> to the ground

וְיֵשׁ֡וּעַ <WH3442> Also Jeshua וּבָנִ֡י <WH1137> and Bani וְשֵׁרֵ֥בְיָ֣ה ׀ <WH8274> and Sherebiah יָמִ֡ין <WH3226> Jamin עַקּ֡וּב <WH6126> Akkub שַׁבְּתַ֣י ׀ <WH7678> Shabbethai הֽוֹדִיָּ֡ה <WH1941> Hodijah מַעֲשֵׂיָ֡ה <WH4641> Maaseiah קְלִיטָ֣א <WH7042> Kelita עֲזַרְיָה֩ <WH5838> Azariah יוֹזָבָ֨ד <WH3107> Jozabad חָנָ֤ן <WH2605> Hanan פְּלָאיָה֙ <WH6411> Pelaiah וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and the Levites מְבִינִ֥ים <WH995> to understand אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> caused the people לַתּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> the law וְהָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and the people עַל־ <WH5921> and עָמְדָֽם׃ <WH5975> abide

וַֽיִּקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> So they read בַסֵּ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> in the law הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God מְפֹרָ֑שׁ <WH6567> distinctly וְשׂ֣וֹם <WH7760> and gave שֶׂ֔כֶל <WH7922> the sense וַיָּבִ֖ינוּ <WH995> and caused [them] to understand בַּמִּקְרָֽא׃ <WH4744> the reading ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said נְחֶמְיָ֣ה <WH5166> And Nehemiah ה֣וּא <WH1931> who הַתִּרְשָׁ֡תָא <WH8660> which [is] the Tirshatha וְעֶזְרָ֣א <WH5830> and Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֣ן ׀ <WH3548> the priest הַסֹּפֵ֡ר <WH5608> the scribe וְהַלְוִיִּם֩ <WH3881> and the Levites הַמְּבִינִ֨ים <WH995> that taught אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> the people לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> unto all the people הַיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> This day קָדֹֽשׁ־ <WH6918> [is] holy הוּא֙ <WH1931> This לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽתְאַבְּל֖וּ <WH56> mourn וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּבְכּ֑וּ <WH1058> not nor weep כִּ֤י <WH3588> for בוֹכִים֙ <WH1058> wept כָּל־ <WH3605> for all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> For all the people כְּשָׁמְעָ֖ם <WH8085> when they heard אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> of the law

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then he said לָהֶ֡ם לְכוּ֩ <WH1980> Go אִכְל֨וּ <WH398> eat מַשְׁמַנִּ֜ים <WH4924> the fat וּשְׁת֣וּ <WH8354> and drink מַֽמְתַקִּ֗ים <WH4477> the sweet וְשִׁלְח֤וּ <WH7971> and send מָנוֹת֙ <WH4490> portions לְאֵ֣ין <WH369> has nothing נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> unto them for whom nothing is prepared ל֔וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> [is] holy הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> for [this] day לַאֲדֹנֵ֑ינוּ <WH136> to our Lord וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּ֣עָצֵ֔בוּ <WH6087> neither be ye sorry כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חֶדְוַ֥ת <WH2304> for the joy יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הִ֥יא <WH1931> he מָֽעֻזְּכֶֽם׃ <WH4581> is your strength

וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <WH3881> So the Levites מַחְשִׁ֤ים <WH2814> stilled לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> all the people לֵאמֹ֣ר <WH559> saying הַ֔סּוּ <WH2013> Hold your peace כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> for the day קָדֹ֑שׁ <WH6918> [is] holy וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּעָצֵֽבוּ׃ <WH6087> neither be ye grieved

וַיֵּלְכ֨וּ <WH1980> went כָל־ <WH3605> All הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> And all the people לֶאֱכֹ֤ל <WH398> to eat וְלִשְׁתּוֹת֙ <WH8354> and to drink וּלְשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> and to send מָנ֔וֹת <WH4490> portions וְלַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> and to make שִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> mirth גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> great כִּ֤י <WH3588> because הֵבִ֙ינוּ֙ <WH995> because they had understood בַּדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הוֹדִ֖יעוּ <WH3045> that were declared לָהֶֽם׃ ס

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשֵּׁנִ֡י <WH8145> And on the second נֶאֶסְפוּ֩ <WH622> were gathered together רָאשֵׁ֨י <WH7218> the chief הָאָב֜וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> of all the people הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and the Levites אֶל־ <WH413> to עֶזְרָ֖א <WH5830> unto Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֑ר <WH5608> the scribe וּלְהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <WH7919> even to understand אֶל־ <WH413> into דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> of the law

וַֽיִּמְצְא֖וּ <WH4672> And they found כָּת֣וּב <WH3789> written בַּתּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> in the law אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> how צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> how יֵשְׁב֨וּ <WH3427> should dwell בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּסֻּכּ֛וֹת <WH5521> in booths בֶּחָ֖ג <WH2282> in the feast בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7637> of the seventh

וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יַשְׁמִ֗יעוּ <WH8085> And that they should publish וְיַעֲבִ֨ירוּ <WH5674> and circulated ק֥וֹל <WH6963> A proclamation בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵיהֶם֮ <WH5892> in all their cities וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <WH3389> and in Jerusalem לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying צְא֣וּ <WH3318> Go forth הָהָ֗ר <WH2022> unto the mount וְהָבִ֙יאוּ֙ <WH935> and fetch עֲלֵי־ <WH5929> branches זַ֙יִת֙ <WH2132> olive וַעֲלֵי־ <WH5929> branches עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> trees שֶׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> and pine וַעֲלֵ֤י <WH5929> branches הֲדַס֙ <WH1918> and myrtle וַעֲלֵ֣י <WH5929> and branches תְמָרִ֔ים <WH8558> and palm וַעֲלֵ֖י <WH5929> and branches עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> trees עָבֹ֑ת <WH5687> of thick לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <WH6213> to make סֻכֹּ֖ת <WH5521> booths כַּכָּתֽוּב׃ <WH3789> as [it is] written פ

וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <WH3318> went forth הָעָם֮ <WH5971> So the people וַיָּבִיאוּ֒ <WH935> and brought וַיַּעֲשׂוּ֩ <WH6213> [them] and made לָהֶ֨ם <WH1992> like סֻכּ֜וֹת <WH5521> themselves booths אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every one עַל־ <WH5921> on גַּגּוֹ֙ <WH1406> upon the roof of his house וּבְחַצְרֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH2691> and in their courts וּבְחַצְר֖וֹת <WH2691> and in the courts בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וּבִרְחוֹב֙ <WH7339> and in the street שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> of the water וּבִרְח֖וֹב <WH7339> and in the street שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> of the gate אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> of Ephraim

וַיַּֽעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> made כָֽל־ <WH3605> the entire הַ֠קָּהָל <WH6951> And all the congregation הַשָּׁבִ֨ים <WH7725> of them that were come again מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשְּׁבִ֥י ׀ <WH7628> out of the captivity סֻכּוֹת֮ <WH5521> booths וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> and sat בַסֻּכּוֹת֒ <WH5521> under the booths כִּ֣י <WH3588> had indeed לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not עָשׂ֡וּ <WH6213> done so מִימֵי֩ <WH3117> for since the days יֵשׁ֨וּעַ <WH3442> of Jeshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֥וּן <WH5126> of Nun כֵּן֙ <WH3651> so בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> had not the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel עַ֖ד <WH5704> to that הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> become שִׂמְחָ֖ה <WH8057> gladness גְּדוֹלָ֥ה <WH1419> great מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> And there was very

וַ֠יִּקְרָא <WH7121> he read בְּסֵ֨פֶר <WH5612> in the book תּוֹרַ֤ת <WH8451> of the law הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God י֣וֹם ׀ <WH3117> Also day בְּי֔וֹם <WH3117> by day מִן־ <WH4480> at הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> from the first עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הָאַחֲר֑וֹן <WH314> unto the last וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> And they kept חָג֙ <WH2282> the feast שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days וּבַיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֛י <WH8066> and on the eighth עֲצֶ֖רֶת <WH6116> [was] a solemn assembly כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> according unto the manner פ
